verses.verse: <S%G1352>Therefore<s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G379>inexcusable<s%>, <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G3956>whosoever<s%> thou art that <S%G2919>judgest<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> thou <S%G2919>judgest<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%>, thou <S%G2632>condemnest<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> thou that <S%G2919>judgest<s%> <S%G4238>doest<s%> the same <S%G846>things<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> we are <S%G1492>sure<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> them which <S%G4238>commit<s%> such <S%G5108>things<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> thinkest <S%G3049>thou<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%>, <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, that <S%G2919>judgest<s%> them which <S%G4238>do<s%> such <S%G5108>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>doest<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> shalt <S%G1628>escape<s%> the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>?

<S%G2228>Or<s%> despisest <S%G2706>thou<s%> the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5544>goodness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G463>forbearance<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3115>longsuffering<s%>; not <S%G50>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G5543>goodness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G71>leadeth<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%>?

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4643>hardness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G279>impenitent<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> treasurest <S%G2343>up<s%> unto <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G1722>against<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G602>revelation<s%> of the righteous <S%G1341>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>;
<S%G3739>Who<s%> will <S%G591>render<s%> to every <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%>:

To them who <S%G3303>by<s%> <S%G2596><s%> patient <S%G5281>continuance<s%> in <S%G18>well<s%> <S%G2041>doing<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> for <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5092>honour<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G861>immortality<s%>, <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>:

<S%G1161>But<s%> unto them that are <S%G1537>contentious<s%> <S%G2052><s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> do not <S%G544>obey<s%> <S%G3303><s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3982>obey<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%>, <S%G2372>indignation<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%>,

<S%G2347>Tribulation<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4730>anguish<s%>, <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> that <S%G2716>doeth<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>, of the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of the <S%G1672>Gentile<s%>; Gentile: Gr. Greek

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>, <S%G5092>honour<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>, to every <S%G3956>man<s%> that <S%G2038>worketh<s%> <S%G18>good<s%>, to the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to the <S%G1672>Gentile<s%>: Gentile: Gr. Greek
<S%G1063>For<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> respect of <S%G4382>persons<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> have <S%G264>sinned<s%> without <S%G460>law<s%> <S%G622>shall<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G622>perish<s%> without <S%G460>law<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> have <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> shall be <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>;

<S%G1063>(For<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G202>hearers<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> are <S%G1342>just<s%> <S%G3844>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G4163>doers<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> shall be <S%G1344>justified<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G4160>do<s%> by <S%G5449>nature<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> contained in the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G3778>these<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G1526>are<s%> a <S%G3551>law<s%> unto <S%G1438>themselves<s%>:

<S%G3748>Which<s%> <S%G1731>shew<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1123>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>, <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> also bearing <S%G4828>witness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> their <S%G3053>thoughts<s%> the mean while <S%G2723>accusing<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2532>else<s%> <S%G626>excusing<s%> one <S%G3342>another<s%> <S%G240><s%>;) their conscience: or, the conscience witnessing with them the mean: or, between themselves

<S%G1722>In<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2927>secrets<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%>.

<S%G2396>Behold<s%>, <S%G4771>thou<s%> art <S%G2028>called<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1879>restest<s%> in the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> makest thy <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1097>knowest<s%> his <S%G2307>will<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1381>approvest<s%> the things that are more <S%G1308>excellent<s%>, being <S%G2727>instructed<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>; approvest: or, triest the things that differ

<S%G5037>And<s%> art <S%G3982>confident<s%> that thou <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G1511>art<s%> a <S%G3595>guide<s%> of the <S%G5185>blind<s%>, a <S%G5457>light<s%> of them which are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%>,

An <S%G3810>instructor<s%> of the <S%G878>foolish<s%>, a <S%G1320>teacher<s%> of <S%G3516>babes<s%>, which <S%G2192>hast<s%> the <S%G3446>form<s%> of <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>.

Thou <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1321>teachest<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%>, teachest <S%G1321>thou<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%>? thou that <S%G2784>preachest<s%> a man <S%G2813>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2813>steal<s%>, dost thou <S%G2813>steal<s%>?

Thou that <S%G3004>sayest<s%> a man <S%G3431>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> commit <S%G3431>adultery<s%>, dost thou commit <S%G3431>adultery<s%>? thou that <S%G948>abhorrest<s%> <S%G1497>idols<s%>, dost thou commit <S%G2416>sacrilege<s%>?

<S%G3739>Thou<s%> that makest thy <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3847>breaking<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> dishonourest <S%G818>thou<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>?

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G3303>verily<s%> <S%G5623>profiteth<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> thou <S%G4238>keep<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> thou <S%G5600>be<s%> a <S%G3848>breaker<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> is <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%>.

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> <S%G5442>keep<s%> the <S%G1345>righteousness<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G3049>shall<s%> <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> be <S%G3049>counted<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> shall <S%G2919>not<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> which is <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G5449>nature<s%>, if it <S%G5055>fulfil<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, who <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G1121>letter<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> dost <S%G3848>transgress<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>?

<S%G1063>For<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew<s%>, which is one <S%G1722>outwardly<s%> <S%G5318><s%>; <S%G3761>neither<s%> is that <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>, which is <S%G1722>outward<s%> <S%G5318><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>:

<S%G235>But<s%> he is a <S%G2453>Jew<s%>, which is one <S%G1722>inwardly<s%> <S%G2927><s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> is that of the <S%G2588>heart<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, and <S%G3756>not<s%> in the <S%G1121>letter<s%>; <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.
